data.title: Our Mission Statement & Core Values
data.meta_description: As part of McCarthy Lebit’s ongoing strategic plan, the leadership of the firm has articulated our firm mission statement and identified our core values.
data.meta_site_name: McCarthy Lebit - A Cleveland/Ohio Law Firm
data.text:
As part of McCarthy Lebit’s ongoing strategic plan, the leadership of the firm has articulated our firm mission statement and identified our core values. The following principles consistently guide the firm’s lawyers and staff in the successful pursuit of clients’ interests and the advancement of the firm.

Mission Statement

McCarthy Lebit is a premier, full-service law firm offering a wide range of sophisticated legal services, backed by market-leading talent, ensuring a client experience that is efficient in execution and attentive to client needs and best interests. Success for our clients is achieved through skilled and tenacious advocacy, personal attention, and thoughtful, informed advice. We are a collegial and inclusive firm where delivering client value is a core principle that differentiates our service in the marketplace.

Core Values
